name: Zapdos

ability.name: Peal of Thunder
ability.effect: When you put Zapdos into play (except during setup), do 30 damage to a Pokemon other than Zapdos chosen at random (use a d6).

attacks.name: Big Thunder
attacks.effect: Choose a Pokemon other than Zapdos at random. This attack does 70 damage to that Pokemon.

flavor: This legendary bird Pokemon is said to appear when the sky turns dark and lightning showers down.
